Nothing Deleted Image Removed From Favourites Home NASA Image of the Day Search BBC News reader The Guardian News Article Search NASA Earth Imagery Database Help Open Close Click to view or long click to delete Finish Longitude: Latitude: Date: Add to Favourites Enter the longitude and latitude of a position on earth Ranges from -180.00 to 180.00 Ranges from -90.00 to 90.00 Fetch Image View Favorites Can\'t add to favorites No image found for the provided coordinates Delete this Item? Yes Item already exists in favorites Author: Please enter valid coordinates Enter a longitude value between -180 and 180 and a latitude value between -90 and 90 OK Final Project for CST2335 Welcome, Choose one of the Main four activities this app provides Nasa Image of the Day Select a date by pressing \"CHOOSE A DATE\". Then press \"SEARCH\" to view that date\'s image information. Two new buttons will appear. Select image url to view the image and select \" ADD TO FAVOURITES\" to add the image to your favourites list. To view favourites select \"FAVOURITES\". Within the favourites list you can search for a specific image, or long press an image to delete it from favourites. Version: 1 Image added to favourites UNDO Image Removed From Favourites Hello Remove Favourite? NasaImgKey Back Open Image Hide

// BBC Strings SHOW ALL SHOW FAVORITES Insert your email here ADD TO MAILING LIST HELP RETURN Added to favorites Removed from favorites DISPLAYING LATEST ARTICLES DISPLAYING FAVORITE ARTICLES Add to Favorites Remove from Favorites Do you wish to add article to favorites Do you wish to remove article from favorites? YES NO has been added to the mailing list HOW TO USE APP OK - Click on SHOW ALL to display latest articles - Click on SHOW FAVORITES to display favorite articles - Insert email address and click button to add email to mailing list - Long click on an article to add to add to or remove from favorites - Click on an article to display article details
